mapper.select: select nickname, name, birth_hh, birth_mm, user_img, email, sex, birth, email from user_info where user_num=#{user_num}
mapper.update: update user_info set user_img=#{user_img}, name=#{name}, nickname=#{nickname}, sex=#{sex}, birth_hh=#{birth_hh}, birth_mm=#{birth_mm}, birth=#{birth}, email=#{email}, saju_year=#{saju_year}, saju_mon=#{saju_mon}, saju_day=#{saju_day}, ilju=#{ilju} where user_num=#{user_num}
